title: Reflecting on Life on the Diamond and in the Kremlin (Northwestern University)
text: ( Source : Northwestern University ) EVANSTON, Ill. --- Irwin Weil , professor emeritus in Slavic Languages and Literatures, will present an account of his newly published memoir, 'From the Cincinnati Reds to the Moscow Reds ' at the Evanston
